Open-Source-Implementierung der Google-T: Open Source Solution of the Google Tracing API
Die Alternative zur Corona-Warn-App ohne: The alternative to the Corona-Warn-App – without Google Services
Eine transparente OpenSource-Lösung für: A transparent open source solution for older smartphones and for other operating systems
CoraLibre ist eine offene Alternative zu: CoraLibre is    an open alternative to the official Corona-Warn-App and works without the non-transparent Google Services.
4 Gründe für die CoraLibre-App:: 4 reasons to use the CoraLibre app:
CoraLibre ist auch für Nutzer zugänglich: CoraLibre is available for users that use Android without Google Play Services.
Keine Google-Play-Services nötig: Google Play Services are not required
CoraLibre kommt ohne Google-Play-Service: CoraLibre works without Google Play Services and offers the same functionality as the official Corona-Warn-App.
Auch Nutzer, die nicht über die benötigt: Users with devices that do not meet the system requirements for the official app will still be able to use CoraLibre.*
Der Quellcode des offiziellen Google Tra: The source code of the official Google Tracing protocol is not publicly available - CoraLibre's source code is entirely accessible on GitHub.
*Voraussetzung ist ein Android-Smartphon: *An Android smartphone with Bluetooth LE support is required.
Ein Mann arbeitet am Computer: A man is working on a computer
Auch du kannst uns dabei helfen, CoraLib: You can help to bring CoraLibre to life!
Die CoraLibre-App wird ehrenamtlich und: The Corona-Warn-App is continuously being developed on a voluntary basis. Nevertheless we need your support and are happy about every helping hand. If you're a developer willing to help, don't hesitate to get in touch with us.
Illustration von einem Mann, dem Ideen d: Illustration of a man having many ideas
Hast du noch Fragen, Wünsche, Anregungen: Do you have any questions, wishes or suggestions?
Wir suchen noch nach tatkräftiger Unters: We are still looking app developers willing to help us out.
Dieses Projekt wird von der hessischen L: This project is funded by the Hessian Land Government.
Das Projekt CoraLibre wird finanziell du: This project is financially supported by the Hessian state during the period from 10.06.2020 until 31.12.2020. The goal is to build a modern platform that ensures the availability of the app as well as to promote international intercommunication with other contract tracing apps.
